Text.val: 06.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
15.02.2012 SH SCR17109 Removed GM900 and changed v.ACL to PI.ACL
02.02.2012 JH SCR17062 Changed calls of GB500_OLD to the new GB500
27.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM/UNTIL to alpha 20
13.07.2007 GB SCR12580 Intercredit adjustments 1/OCA003CLIM - Client attributes
-- Disabled buttons in toolbar in case of empty view
-- Users press key 'Esc', see R.M. where UserAction 19 is performed
... Users changes something on screen, ask for confirmation

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLIM_ADMNO, CLIM_CLNTNO, CLIM_LINENO, CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM, CLIM_INVOICENO_UNTIL from :1/CLIM where CLIM_ADMNO = :2 and CLIM_CLNTNO = :3 and CLIM_INVOICENO_CONTAINS = '' :4 order by CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM, CLIM_INVOICENO_UNTIL

Text.val: Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM contains only values 0-9
Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_UNTIL contains only values 0-9
